# External reference resources (catalog)

This entry is a curated list of external resources that are useful for:

- debugging separation quality regressions
- understanding model architectures and inference recipes
- sourcing model weights, configs, and reference implementations
- comparing outputs against known-good tools/services

## Hugging Face (models)

- https://huggingface.co/becruily/mel-band-roformer-deux
- https://huggingface.co/becruily/mel-band-roformer-instrumental
- https://huggingface.co/GaboxR67/MelBandRoformers
- https://huggingface.co/pcunwa/BS-Roformer-HyperACE
- https://huggingface.co/pcunwa/Mel-Band-Roformer-Inst
- https://huggingface.co/anvuew/BS-RoFormer

## GitHub (repos/releases)

- https://github.com/Anjok07/ultimatevocalremovergui
- https://github.com/ZFTurbo/Music-Source-Separation-Training
- https://github.com/undef13/splifft/releases
- https://github.com/kubinka0505/matchering-cli

## Online services

- https://mvsep.com/
- https://x-minus.pro/ai

## Downloads / file hosting

- https://gofile.io/d/jJbBtm

## Kaggle notebooks

- https://www.kaggle.com/code/zzryndm/music-source-separation-training-inference-webui
- https://www.kaggle.com/code/zzryndm/apollo-colab-inference-i-fucking-give-up-with-this

## Google Colab
